events.message: I recently purchased a jacket but it doesn't fit properly. I would like to request a refund for this item as soon as possible.
The reported issue has been reviewed and categorized under the Refund cluster for processing.
A customer service agent has been assigned to handle this refund request to ensure proper follow-up.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you want to request a refund for your jacket purchase.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm whether the item is unused and in its original packaging for the refund process?
The order number is 123456789. The jacket is unused and still in the original packaging, ready to be returned.
Thank you for the details. We will issue a prepaid return label to your email within 24 hours for you to send the jacket back and receive a full refund.
Thanks for the quick response and the solution. I appreciate the help and look forward to receiving the return label.
The return label has been sent to your email. Once we receive the returned jacket, your refund will be processed immediately.
We noticed your returned jacket has been received. Please let us know if the refund was processed to your satisfaction.
I have received the refund in my account today. Thanks for the efficient process and support throughout.
Closing this case as the refund has been successfully processed and the customer has confirmed receipt.
